mapper.update: update V_HIS_PHYSICAL_SUMMARY set PHYSICAL_NUMBER = #{physicalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CLASS_CODE = #{itemClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CLASS_NAME = #{itemClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY = #{physicalSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_CODE = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_TIME = #{physicalSummaryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID = #{physicalSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID, PHYSICAL_NUMBER, ITEM_CLASS_CODE, ITEM_CLASS_NAME, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_TIME from V_HIS_PHYSICAL_SUMMARY where PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID = #{physicalSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID, PHYSICAL_NUMBER, ITEM_CLASS_CODE, ITEM_CLASS_NAME, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_TIME from V_HIS_PHYSICAL_SUMMARY
